To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MomentumPercent _momp;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_momp = MOMP(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_momp.IsReady)
{
    var period = _momp.Period.Value;
    var current = _momp.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.momp = self.MOMP(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.momp.IsReady:
    period = self.momp.Period.Value
    current = self.momp.Current.Value
